word: Tuesday morning it came to me distinctly, "Go to Iowa; I have a work for you to do." I should as soon have thought of going to Europe, but I told your father my convictions, that I should go with him or alone. He seemed surprised and said, "We will go."--Letter 5a, 1881, p. 4. (To Elder and Mrs. W. C. White, June 14, 1881.)
